thread.title: AD: Get great savings of up to RM150,000 on a Jeep!
thread.title_full: AD: Get great savings of up to RM150,000 on a Jeep!

author: Harvinder Sidhu
title: AD: Get great savings of up to RM150,000 on a Jeep!
text:
Home » Special Coverage » Advertorial » AD: Get great savings of up to RM150,000 on a Jeep! AD: Get great savings of up to RM150,000 on a Jeep! 12 January 2017 11:30 am / Comments are Disabled 
Discover your good fortune this Chinese New Year as Jeep is offering unbeatable deals for selected models. You’re all invited to the DRB-HICOM Autofest 2017 happening this weekend, January 14 and 15 at the EON Complex, Glenmarie to enjoy savings of up to RM150,000! 
The attractive savings on offer go up to RM90,000 for the Jeep Wrangler, so you can own the iconic American off roader from RM218,889. The ultra distinctive Jeep Cherokee meanwhile, can be had with savings of up to RM110,000, so it can be yours from RM238,889. 
Best of all, is the flagship Jeep Grand Cherokee. This luxurious, powerful and all-capable SUV is now available with savings of up to RM150,000, so you can call it your own for as low as RM298,889. Deals don’t come any sweeter than this. 
It’s time to take your festivities to greater heights by adding a rugged Jeep to your home this new year. Get more information on this promo at Jeep Malaysia’s website or its official Facebook page . Harvinder Singh Sidhu thinks there's nothing better than Formula 1, not even sliced bread. Having written about cars since 2006, he plunged head first into the industry out of a passion for all things four-wheeled and everything in between. The F1 enthusiast has been following the sport since 1999 and has been keeping up with it since. In between races he keeps himself busy as the host of the Driven motoring TV programme and as our version of the Joker.
